intro: Elsholtzia zhongyangii, commonly known as the Yunnan elsholtzia, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the Lamiaceae family, which includes many aromatic herbs and shrubs. The plant is characterized by its upright growth habit and narrow, lance-shaped leaves. It produces small, tubular flowers that are typically pink or purple in color. Elsholtzia zhongyangii is often found in rocky or mountainous regions, thriving in well-drained soils.
